wiki.summary: .neon is the second studio album by Lantlôs, released on 14 June 2010 by Lupus Lounge. Line-up Herbst — composition, instruments, lyrics, additional vocals*Neige — vocals Staff Conny Schattka (iheartsound, Bielefeld, Germany) — recording (February 2009), mixing (July 2009)Fursy Teyssier (Les Discrets) — paintings, designMK — production *Spoken word on „Minusmensch“ Read more on Last.fm.
